/* jshint node: true, strict: true */
'use strict';
 
 
/*=====================================
 =        Default Configuration        =
 =====================================*/
 
// Please use config.js to override these selectively:
var directory = {
    src: 'src',
    zip: "dist",
    dest: 'app'
};
var config = {
    modules: [],
    watch : true,
    vendor: {
        js: [
            './' + directory.src + '/**/*.js',
            '!./' + directory.src + '/public/**/*.*'
        ],
 
        less: {
            src: [
                './' + directory.src + '/**/*.less',
                '!./' + directory.src + '/public/**/*.*'
            ],
            paths: []
        },
 
        css: [
            './' + directory.src + '/**/*.css',
            '!./' + directory.src + '/public/**/*.*'
        ],
 
        html: [
            './' + directory.src + '/**/*.html',
            '!./' + directory.src + '/public/**/*.*'
        ],
        public: [
            './' + directory.src + '/public/**/*.*'
        ],
        publicjs: [
            './' + directory.src + '/public/**/*.js'
        ],
        publicWithoutJs: [
            '!./' + directory.src + '/public/**/*.js',
            './' + directory.src + '/public/**/*.*'
        ]
    },
 
    jsHintOpt: {
        lookup: './.jshintrc',
 
        /*
        是否启用一些警告 false-关闭 true-启用 注释掉默认关闭
        */
        bitwise : false,//禁止使用位操作符
        curly : true,//禁止省略循环和条件语句后的大括号
        eqeqeq : true,//禁止使用"=="和"!="，而应该使用"==="和"!=="
        forin:false,//在所有"for in"循环中，必须使用hasOwnPropery过滤掉对象继承来的成员.
        indent: 4,//代码缩进
        latedef: false,//禁止在变量定义之前使用它.
        noempty:true,//不允许代码中出现空的语句块（"{}"）
        quotmark: true,//该选项用于统一代码中的引号风格，single 只能使用单引号 double -- 只能使用双引号 true -- 两者任选其一，但不能同时出现.
        undef: false,//禁止使用未定义的变量.
        unused: 'vars',//该选项激活后，对于"已定义却未使用的变量"会给出警告，可选的值有三个：vars -- 只检查变量，不检查函数形参；strict -- 检查变量和函数形参；true -- 检查变量和函数形参，但允许这种情况：一个未使用的形参后紧随一个被使用的形参.
        trailing: true,//禁止在代码的末尾出现空白
        maxdepth:3,//设置每个函数中代码块嵌套层级的上限.
        maxstatements : 100,//设置每个函数中语句数量的上限
        maxlen: 160,//设定每行的最大字符长度
 
        /*
        是否关闭一些警告 false-启用 true-关闭 注释掉默认启用
        */
        asi : false,//值为false时，如果代码末尾省略了分号，则JSHint会给出警告；值为true时，则不会.
        boss:true,//值为false时，如果预期为条件表达式的地方使用了赋值表达式，则JSHint会给出警告；值为true时，则不会.
        debug: true,//值为false时，如果代码中有debugger语句，则JSHint会给出警告；值为true时，则不会.
        eqnull : true,//值为false时，如果代码中使用"=="来比较变量与null，则JSHint会给出警告；值为true时，则不会.
        funcscope : false,//值为false时，如果在控制语句中定义了变量，却在控制语句之外使用变量，则JSHint会给出警告
        sub : true//值为true时，允许用obj['name']和obj.name两种方式访问对象的属性；值为false时，不允许使用obj['name']方式，除非只能使用这种方式访问.
    },
 
    server: {
        host: '0.0.0.0',
        port: '8000'
    }
 
};
 
Iif (require('fs').existsSync('./config.js')) {
    var configFn = require('./config');
    configFn(config);
}
/*========================================
 =            Requiring stuffs            =
 ========================================*/
 
var gulp = require('gulp'),
    seq = require('gulp-run-sequence'),
    less = require('gulp-less'),
    connect = require('gulp-connect'),
    uglify = require('gulp-uglify'),
    sourcemaps = require('gulp-sourcemaps'),
    cssmin = require('gulp-cssmin'),
    rimraf = require('gulp-rimraf'),
    rename = require('gulp-rename'),
    jshint = require('gulp-jshint'),
    stylish = require('jshint-stylish'),
    path = require('path'),
    zip = require('gulp-zip'),
    through = require('through2'),
    browserSync = require('browser-sync').create(),
    fs = require('fs'),
    request = require('request'),
    inquirer = require("inquirer");
 
var modelFolders = [],
    JSESSIONID = '',
    data = {},
    upload_modules = [];
 
/*================================================
 =            Report Errors to Console            =
 ================================================*/
 
gulp.on('error', function (e) {
    throw(e);
});
 
 
/*=========================================
 =            Clean dest folder            =
 =========================================*/
 
gulp.task('clean', function (cb) {
    return gulp.src([
            directory.dest
        ], {read: false})
        .pipe(rimraf());
});
 
 
/*==========================================
 =            Start a web server            =
 ==========================================*/
 
gulp.task('connect', function () {
    if (typeof config.server === 'object') {
        connect.server({
            root: directory.dest,
            host: config.server.host,
            port: config.server.port,
            livereload: true
        });
    } else {
        throw new Error('Connect is not configured');
    }
});
 
 
/*==============================================================
 =            Setup live reloading on source changes            =
 ==============================================================*/
 
gulp.task('livereload', function () {
    gulp.src(path.join(directory.dest, '**/*.html'), {read: false})
        .pipe(connect.reload());
});
 
 
/*=================================================
 =            Copy public files to dest              =
 =================================================*/
 
gulp.task('public', function () {
    if (config.minPublic) {
        gulp.src(
            config.vendor.publicjs, {base: directory.src}
            )
            .pipe(sourcemaps.init())
            //.pipe(concat('app.js'))
            .pipe(uglify())
            .pipe(rename({suffix: '.min'}))
            .pipe(sourcemaps.write('.'))
            .pipe(gulp.dest(directory.dest));
        gulp.src(
            config.vendor.publicWithoutJs, {base: directory.src}
            )
            .pipe(gulp.dest(directory.dest));
    } else {
        return gulp.src(config.vendor.public, {base: directory.src})
            .pipe(gulp.dest(directory.dest));
    }
});
 
 
/*=================================================
 =            Copy html files to dest              =
 =================================================*/
 
gulp.task('html', function () {
    gulp.src(config.vendor.html, {base: directory.src})
        .pipe(gulp.dest(directory.dest));
});
 
 
/*======================================================================
 =            Compile, minify, mobilize less                            =
 ======================================================================*/
 
gulp.task('less', function () {
    return gulp.src(config.vendor.less.src, {base: directory.src}).pipe(less())
        .pipe(cssmin())
        .pipe(rename({suffix: '.min'}))
        .pipe(gulp.dest(directory.dest));
});
 
 
/*======================================================================
 =            Compile, minify, mobilize css                            =
 ======================================================================*/
 
gulp.task('css', function () {
    return gulp.src(config.vendor.css, {base: directory.src})
        .pipe(cssmin())
        .pipe(rename({suffix: '.min'}))
        .pipe(gulp.dest(directory.dest));
});
 
 
/*====================================================================
 =            Compile and minify js generating source maps            =
 ====================================================================*/
// - Orders ng deps automatically
// - Precompile templates to ng templateCache
 
gulp.task('js', ['hint'], function (done) {
    return gulp.src(
        config.vendor.js, {base: directory.src}
        )
        .pipe(sourcemaps.init())
        //.pipe(concat('app.js'))
        .pipe(uglify())
        .pipe(rename({suffix: '.min'}))
        .pipe(sourcemaps.write('.'))
        .pipe(gulp.dest(directory.dest));
});
 
 
/*====================================================================
 =            jsHint            =
 ====================================================================*/
 
gulp.task('hint', function () {
    return gulp.src(config.vendor.js)
        .pipe(jshint(config.jsHintOpt))
        //.pipe(jshint.reporter('fail'))
        .pipe(jshint.reporter(stylish));
});
 
 
/*===================================================================
 =            Watch for source changes and rebuild/reload            =
 ===================================================================*/
 
gulp.task('watch', function () {
    if (typeof config.server === 'object') {
        gulp.watch([directory.dest + '/**/*'], ['livereload']);
    }
    gulp.watch([config.vendor.html], ['html']);
    gulp.watch([config.vendor.less.src], ['less']);
    gulp.watch([config.vendor.css], ['css']);
    gulp.watch([config.vendor.js], ['js']);
    gulp.watch([config.vendor.public], ['public']);
});
 
 
/*===================================================
 =            Starts a browser-sync Server                 =
 ===================================================*/
 
gulp.task('browser-sync', function () {
    browserSync.init({
        proxy: "localhost:8000"
    });
});
 
 
/*======================================
 =            Build Sequence            =
 ======================================*/
 
gulp.task('build', function (done) {
    var tasks = ['js', 'html', 'css', 'public', 'less'];
    seq('clean', tasks, done);
});
 
 
/*====================================
 =            Default Task            =
 ====================================*/
 
gulp.task('default', function (done) {
    var tasks = [];
 
    if (typeof config.server === 'object') {
        tasks.push('connect');
    }
    if(config.watch){
        tasks.push('watch');
    }
    seq('build', tasks, done);
});
 
/*====================================
 =            clean dist Task            =
 ====================================*/
 
gulp.task('clean_zip', function () {
    return gulp.src([
            './' + directory.zip
        ], {read: false})
        .pipe(rimraf());
});
 
 
/*====================================
 =            get model Task            =
 ====================================*/
 
gulp.task('get_model', function () {
    return gulp.src([path.join(directory.dest, '/*')])
        .pipe(through.obj(function (file, enc, cb) {
            modelFolders.push(file.relative);
            cb();
        }));
});
 
/*====================================
 =             Task            =
 ====================================*/
 
gulp.task('select_modules',['zip'], function (done) {
    var moduleNames = [];
    for (var i = 0, l = config.modules.length; i < l; i++) {
        if (config.modules[i].usable) {
            moduleNames.push(config.modules[i].module);
        }
    }
    inquirer.prompt([{
            type: 'checkbox',
            name: 'moduleNames',
            message: '选择要上传的模块             ()',
            choices: moduleNames,
            default: moduleNames
        }], function (answers) {
            moduleNames = answers.moduleNames;
            for (var i = 0, l = moduleNames.length; i < l; i++) {
                for (var j = 0, m = config.modules.length; j < m; j++) {
                    if (moduleNames[i] === config.modules[j].module) {
                        upload_modules.push(config.modules[j]);
                    }
                }
            }
            done();
        }
    );
});
 
/*====================================
 =            zip Task            =
 ====================================*/
 
 
gulp.task('zip', ['clean_zip', 'get_model'], function (done) {
    for (var i = 0; i < modelFolders.length; i++) {
        var model = modelFolders[i];
        gulp.src(['!**/*.map', './' + directory.dest + '/' + model + '/**'], {base: directory.dest})
            .pipe(zip(model + '.zip'))
            .pipe(gulp.dest('./' + directory.zip));
    }
    done();
});
 
 
/*====================================
 =         login Task            =
 ====================================*/
 
gulp.task('login', ['select_modules'], function (done) {
    request.post({
        url: config.url + '/knd_xSimple/apply/logins_login.action',
        formData: {
            'username': config.loginfo.username,
            'pas': config.loginfo.passworld,
            'autologin': ''
        }
    }, function optionalCallback(err, httpResponse, body) {
        if (err) {
            return console.error('failed:', err);
        }
        if (!err && httpResponse.statusCode == 200) {
            JSESSIONID = httpResponse.headers['set-cookie'][1].split(';')[0];
            done();
        }
 
    });
});
 
/*====================================
 =         upload zip Task            =
 ====================================*/
 
gulp.task('upload', ['getFid'], function (done) {
    var cookie = request.cookie(JSESSIONID),
        j = request.jar(),
        count = 0;
    j.setCookie(cookie, config.url);
    for (var i = 0, l = upload_modules.length; i < l; i++) {
        var module = upload_modules[i].module,
            name = upload_modules[i].name;
        var formData = {
            clientVersion: "",
            fid: data[name],
            interfaceUrl: "",
            remark: "",
            workStatus: "usable",
            zipUrl: "",
            uploadFile: {
                value: fs.createReadStream(__dirname + '/' + directory.zip + '/' + module + '.zip'),
                options: {
                    filename: module + '.zip',
                    contentType: 'application/x-zip-compressed'
                }
            }
        };
        request.post({
            url: config.url + '/knd_xSimple/apply/funVer_save.action',
            formData: formData,
            jar: j
        }, function optionalCallback(err, httpResponse, body) {
            if (err) {
                return console.error('failed:', err);
            }
            console.log('successful!' + module + 'has upload');
 
            count += 1;
            if (count === l) {
                done();
            }
        });
    }
});
 
gulp.task('getFid', ['login'], function (done) {
    var cookie = request.cookie(JSESSIONID),
        j = request.jar(),
        count = 0;
    j.setCookie(cookie, config.url);
    request.post({
        url: config.url + '/knd_xSimple/apply/function_list.action',
        jar: j
    }, function optionalCallback(err, httpResponse, body) {
        if (err) {
            return console.error('failed:', err);
        }
        if (!err && httpResponse.statusCode == 200) {
            body = JSON.parse(body);
            for (var i = 0, l = body.aaData.length; i < l; i++) {
                data[body.aaData[i].mtitle] = body.aaData[i].id;
            }
            done();
        }
    });
});
 
 
 
Generated by utility2 at Thu Apr 20 2017 06:15:33 GMT+0000 (UTC)
